name: Lagarteiro
description:
Lagarteiro

Game developed to Tokyo Game Jam 2 (still in development).

The theme was Pump Up Ruins.

So, in this game you are a knight who neeeds help to rebuild a ruined castle.

Use A and D or arrows to move, use SPACE to show next sentences in dialogues.

Credits
  • Pedro Braga - Programmer, Artist, Game Designer
  • Anderson Kroeff - Sound Designer, Game Designer
